name: Drilbert
description:
Help Drilbert the drill boy recover his stolen gold!
Drilbert is a short puzzle game with a unique digging mechanic, made by a solo developer. I hope you like it! Music by Nicole Marie T.

Features

  • Unlimited undo
  • Super moddable: comes with level editor and source code
  • Steam workshop support for custom map packs
  • Full controller support
  • Tight, focused puzzles

Drill Dirt!


Bomb Rocks!
